oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Tribute - AES honors Nashville's Recording Engineer Pioneers - 2016-06-05
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Nashville chapter of the Audio Engineering Society pays tribute to the city's recording pioneers from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on June 5, 2016.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Master of ceremony is Michael Janas. Recording engineers honored are Lou Bradley, Mike Bradley, Joe Mills, Ron "Snake" Reynolds. AES Lifetime Achievement award presented to the family of Denny Purcell. Includes selected recorded audio excerpts.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bradley, Lou; Bradley, Mike; Mills, Joe; Reynolds, Ron; Purcell, Denny; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
